Package de.variantsync.matching.experiments.raqun

Class RaqunSetup

java.lang.Object
de.variantsync.matching.experiments.common.ExperimentSetup
de.variantsync.matching.experiments.raqun.RaqunSetup
public class RaqunSetup extends ExperimentSetup
An ExperimentSetup that provides the required setup data for RaQuN.

  • Constructor Details

    • RaqunSetup

      public RaqunSetup​(String name, int numberOfRepeats, String resultDir, String datasetDir, String dataset, int chunkSize, int startK, int maxK, boolean printVerbose, IVectorization vectorization, ISimilarityFunction similarityFunction, IValidityConstraint validityConstraint)
      Initialize a new setup for an experiment with RaQuN
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the experiment, usually RaQuN plus a postfix
      numberOfRepeats - how often the experiment is repeated
      resultDir - where to save the results
      datasetDir - where to load the dataset from
      dataset - the dataset that is to be loaded
      chunkSize - The size of chunks in which the dataset is to be split. Set INTEGER.MAX_VALUE for no splitting
      startK - The k' to start with if multiple k' are considered
      maxK - The k' to end wth if multiple k' are considered
      printVerbose - Print the matches after completion
      vectorization - The vectorization function that is applied
      similarityFunction - The similarity function that is applied
      validityConstraint - The validity constraint that is applied
